text: Most men love gold. This one is no exception.
To elevate one's friends is only natural.
Most men love gold. This one is no exception.
Loyalty or pain. The choice is theirs.
Loyalty bought is often sold again. We will find other ways to secure support.
Noblemen are fickle, and to offer influence to someone so ambitious would be folly. We will find other ways to secure support.
Perhaps increased influence within the court might sway them to our side.
To rule by violence is brutish. We will find other ways to secure support.
We can dispense with subtlety. Make them see that it is in their best interest to stay in line.
This isn't worth our time. We will find other ways to secure support.
